39  class bin_archive;
40 
47  class archive {
48  protected:
49  bool m_bloading;
50  std::vector<void*> m_vPointerstored;
51 
52  public:
53 
54  enum opening_mode {
55  load, store };
56 
58 
59  archive() : m_bloading(true) {
60  }
61 
62  void init() {
63  m_vPointerstored.clear();
64  m_vPointerstored.push_back(NULL);
65  m_bloading = true;
66  }
67 
71  int put_pointer(void* object);
72 
74 
75  bool set_loading(bool val) {
76  return m_bloading = val;
77  }
79 
80  bool is_loading() {
81  return m_bloading;
82  }
84 
85  bool is_storing() {
86  return !m_bloading;
87  }
88 
89 
90  };
91 
97  class bin_archive : public archive {
98  public:
99 
100  virtual ~bin_archive() {
101  }
102 
104  virtual size_t write(const void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count) = 0;
106  virtual size_t read(void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count) = 0;
107 
111  template <class T>
112  bin_archive& operator<<(T& ogg) {
113  if (is_loading()) throw eternity::exception("write attempt on an archive open for loading.");
114  write(&ogg, sizeof (ogg), 1);
115  return (*this);
116  }
117 
121  template <class T>
122  bin_archive& operator>>(T& ogg) {
123  if (!is_loading()) throw eternity::exception("read attempt on an archive open for storing.");
124  read(&ogg, sizeof (ogg), 1);
125  return (*this);
126  }
127 
129  bin_archive& operator<<(std::string& str);
130 
131 
133  bin_archive& operator>>(std::string& str);
134 
136 
137  template<class t>
138  t* get_object(t** ppObj) {
139  std::string cls_name;
140  *ppObj = NULL;
141 
142  operator>>(cls_name);
143 
144  if ("NULL" != cls_name) {
145  create(cls_name, ppObj);
146 
147  if (NULL != (*ppObj)) {
148  m_vPointerstored.push_back(*ppObj);
149  (*ppObj)->serialize(*this);
150  }
151 
152 
153  } else {
154  int pos = 0;
155 
156  operator>>(pos);
157 
158  *ppObj = static_cast<t*> (m_vPointerstored[pos]);
159 
160  }
161 
162  return *ppObj;
163  }
164 
166 
167  template <class t>
168  t* put_object(t* pObj) {
169  int pos = put_pointer(pObj);
170 
171  if (pos == -1) {
172  //New Object, we have to full serialize it
173  std::string str = get_conventional_name(typeid (*pObj).name());
174  if (str.empty()) str = typeid (*pObj).name();
175  operator<<(str);
176  pObj->serialize(*this);
177  } else {
178  //Object in list, yet. Only store position
179  std::string str = "NULL";
180  operator<<(str);
181  operator<<(pos);
182  }
183 
184  return pObj;
185  }
186  };
187 
193  class file_archive : public bin_archive {
194  std::fstream stream;
195  public:
196 
197  file_archive() {
198  stream.exceptions(std::ios::failbit | std::ios::eofbit | std::ios::badbit);
199  }
200 
201  file_archive(std::string file_name, opening_mode mode);
202 
203  ~file_archive() {
204  close();
205  }
206 
208 
209  void close() {
210 
211  if (stream.is_open()) {
212  stream.close();
213  }
214 
215  archive::init();
216  }
217 
223  void open(std::string file_name, opening_mode mode);
224 
226  void open(std::string sName, bool loading = true);
227 
228  virtual size_t write(const void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count);
229 
230  virtual size_t read(void *buffer, size_t size, size_t count);
231  };
